import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../../components/ui/Card'; import Button from '../../components/ui/Button'; import Input from '../../components/ui/Input'; import Textarea from '../../components/ui/Textarea'; import Modal from '../../components/ui/Modal'; import Badge from '../../components/ui/Badge'; import { Megaphone, Plus, Search, Eye, Edit, Trash2, Calendar, FileText, Image, } from 'lucide-react'; const AdsPage = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [isAddModalOpen, setIsAddModalOpen] = useState(false); const [isDetailModalOpen, setIsDetailModalOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedAd, setSelectedAd] = useState(null); const [newAd, setNewAd] = useState({ title: '', description: '', file: null, }); // Mock data - replace with actual API calls const ads = [ { id: 1, title: 'New Scholarship Opportunities Available', description: 'We have added several new scholarship opportunities for the upcoming academic year. Check out our latest offerings.', file: { name: 'scholarship-announcement.pdf', type: 'pdf', size: '2.3 MB', url: '/api/placeholder/document', }, image: '/api/placeholder/300/200', status: 'published', created_at: '2024-01-20', views: 245, clicks: 18, }, { id: 2, title: 'Application Deadline Reminder', description: 'Don\'t forget! The deadline for March intake applications is approaching fast. Submit your applications now.', file: null, image: '/api/placeholder/300/200', status: 'published', created_at: '2024-01-18', views: 189, clicks: 12, }, { id: 3, title: 'System Maintenance Notice', description: 'Our system will undergo scheduled maintenance this weekend. Please save your work and log out before the maintenance period.', file: null, image: null, status: 'draft', created_at: '2024-01-15', views: 0, clicks: 0, }, ]; const filteredAds = ads.filter( (ad) => ad.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || ad.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const handleViewDetails = (ad) => { setSelectedAd(ad); setIsDetailModalOpen(true); }; const handleSubmitAd = () => { // Submit ad logic here console.log('Submitting ad:', newAd); setIsAddModalOpen(false); setNewAd({ title: '', description: '', file: null }); }; const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const variants = { published: 'success', draft: 'warning', archived: 'secondary', }; return {status}; }; return (
{/* Header */}

setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="pl-10" />

setNewAd({ ...newAd, title: e.target.value })} />
